name: Create new documents from a template in Plumsail Documents from new entries in Typeform
description:
Every time a new entry is created in Typeform, a new document will be instantly created from a template in Plumsail Documents. 

Your Typeform is expected to have these custom fields: Name, Surname. If you donâ€™t have these custom fields in your Typeform, you will need to either create them or map different existing custom fields relevant to you.

This template was created by a 3rd party and not tested by Make. For any inquiries about the template, please reach out to the template creator: support@plumsail.com.
